rukus.text: 7|109|(itaik kanta) hpir'avnutaiya makkalin talaivarkal (hpir'avnai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka ivar cuniyattil mikka vallavaraka irukkirar'' enru kurinarkal
7|110|(atarku hpir'avn) ‘‘ivar unkalai unkal pumiyiliruntu veliyerrivitave ennukirar. Akave, itaip parri unkal karuttu enna?'' (Enru kettan)
7|111|atarkavarkal ‘‘avarukkum avarutaiya cakotararukkum tavanai kotuttuvittu pala pattinankalukkum tupparipavarkalai anuppivai
7|112|Avarkal cuniyattil vallavarkalai um'mitam alaittu varuvarkal'' enru kurinarkal
7|113|(avvaru anuppiyatil pala ticaikalilum irunta) cuniyakkararkal hpir'avnitam vantu nankal ‘‘(musavai) jeyittuvittal niccayamaka enkalukku (atarkuriya) vekumati untu (allava?)'' Enru kettanar
7|114|atarkavan ‘‘am! (Unkalukku vekumati untu.) Melum, niccayamaka ninkal (nam aracavaiyilum enakku) mikka nerunkiyavarkalaka iruppirkal'' enrum kurinan
7|115|(pinnar, accuniyakkararkal musavai nokki) ‘‘musave! (Mutalil umatu tatiyai) ninkal erikirira? Allatu nam erivata?'' Enru kettanar
7|116|atarku musa ‘‘ninkale (mutalil) eriyunkal'' enru kurinar. Avvaru avarkal erintu makkalutaiya kankalaik katti avarkal titukkitumpatiyana makattana cuniyattaic ceytanar
7|117|atucamayam nam ‘‘musave! Nir umatu tatiyai eriviraka'' enru avarukku vahyi arivittom. Avvaru avar eriyave (atu periyatoru pampaki) avarkal (cuniyattal) karpanai ceyta yavaiyum vilunkivittatu
7|118|ivvaru avarkal ceyta anaittum vinaki unmai urutiyayirru
7|119|akave, (karvam kontirunta) avarkal, anku tolviyurru cirumaippatta varkalaka marinarkal
7|121|‘‘akilattar anaivarin iraivanakiya allahvaiye nankal iman (nampikkai) kontu vittom'' enru kurinarkal
7|122|musa, harunutaiya iraivanai nankalum (nampikkai kontom'' enru kurinarkal)

7|123|Atarku hpir'avn (avarkalai nokki) ‘‘unkalukku nan anumatiyalippatarku munnatakave ninkal avarai nampikkai kontu vittirkal. Niccayamaka innakaravacikalai atiliruntu veliyerruvatarkaka (musavutan kalantu) ninkal ceyta catiyakum itu. (Iccatiyin palanai) aticikkirattil ninkal terintu kolvirkal
7|124|niccayamaka nan unkalai maru kai, maru kal vetti unkal anaivaraiyum ciluvaiyil araintu vituven'' enru kurinan
7|125|atarkavarkal ‘‘(avvarayin) niccayamaka nankal enkal iraivanitamtan tirumpic celvom. (Ataipparri enkalukkuk kavalai illai)'' enru kurinarkal

7|126|‘‘innum, enkalitam vanta iraivanin attatcikalai nankal nampikkai kontatait tavira veru etarkakavum ni enkalai palivankavillai'' (enru hpir'avnitam kuriya piraku) ‘‘enkal iraivane! Enkal mitu porumaiyaic corivayaka! (Unakku) murrilum valippattavarkalaka (enkalai akki) enkalai ni kaipparrik kolvayaka!'' (Enru pirarttittarkal)
